00069 class SC_API scfx_params
00070 {

00075

00077                  sc_enc,
00078                  const sc_fxcast_switch& );
00079 
00080 
00081     // query functions

00106     sc_fxcast_switch m_cast_switch;

00111 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00112 
00113 // constructor
00114 
00115 inline
00116 scfx_params::scfx_params( const sc_fxtype_params& type_params_,
00117                           sc_enc enc_,
00118                           const sc_fxcast_switch& cast_sw )
00119 : m_type_params( type_params_ ),
00120   m_enc( enc_ ),
00121   m_cast_switch( cast_sw )
00122 {
00123     if( m_enc == SC_US_ && m_type_params.o_mode() == SC_WRAP_SM )
00124     {
00125         SC_REPORT_ERROR( sc_core::SC_ID_INVALID_O_MODE_,
00126                          "SC_WRAP_SM not defined for unsigned numbers" );
00127         // may continue, if suppressed
00128     }
00129 
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00133 // query functions
00134 
00135 inline
00136 const sc_fxtype_params&
00137 scfx_params::type_params() const
00138 {
00139     return m_type_params;
00140 }
00141

00143 sc_enc
00144 scfx_params::enc() const
00145 {
00146     return m_enc;
00147 }
00148 
00149 inline

00153     return m_cast_switch;
00154 }

00157 // shortcuts
00158 
00159 inline
00160 int
00161 scfx_params::wl() const
00162 {
00163     return m_type_params.wl();
00164 }
00165 
00166 inline
00167 int
00168 scfx_params::iwl() const
00169 {
00170     return m_type_params.iwl();
00171 }
00172 
00173 inline
00174 int
00175 scfx_params::fwl() const
00176 {
00177     return ( m_type_params.wl() - m_type_params.iwl() );
00178 }
00179 
00180 inline
00181 sc_q_mode
00182 scfx_params::q_mode() const
00183 {
00184     return m_type_params.q_mode();
00185 }
00186 
00187 inline
00188 sc_o_mode
00189 scfx_params::o_mode() const
00190 {
00191     return m_type_params.o_mode();
00192 }
00193 
00194 inline
00195 int
00196 scfx_params::n_bits() const
00197 {
00198     return m_type_params.n_bits();
00199 }

00202 // dump content
00203 
00204 inline
00205 void
00206 scfx_params::dump( ::std::ostream& os ) const
00207 {
00208     os << "scfx_params" << ::std::endl;
00209     os << "(" << ::std::endl;
00210     os << "type_params = ";
00211     m_type_params.dump( os );
00212     os << "enc         = " << m_enc << ::std::endl;
00213     os << "cast_switch = ";
00214     m_cast_switch.dump( os );
00215     os << ")" << ::std::endl;
00216 }
